title: Test Song 1
lyrics:
An old silent pond
A frog jumps into the pond
Splash, silence again

[Chorus]
la la la

Winter seclusion
Listening, that evening, to the rain
In the mountain hut

title: Test Song 2
lyrics:
Over the wintry
forest, winds howl in rage
with no leaves to blow

A new morning sun
sends gentle light through the trees
birds stir and take flight
